title: How to Fry Dutch Fisherman's Pancakes

steps.headline: Take the flour, salt, and baking powder and milk into the mixing bowl.
steps.description: Start stirring, until there are no lumps or flour in the mixture.

steps.headline: Crack the eggs and add to the bowl, the pancake mix is ready to fry.
Heat the oil in the pan at moderate temperature.
steps.description: A tablespoon full of oil per pancake will be enough.

steps.headline: Take the amount of 2 to 3 tablespoons per pancake.
steps.description: Distribute it by moving the pan to get the pan surface completely covered with the mass.

steps.headline: Continue frying the pancake until ready.
Flip the pancake over and fry the other side.
Remove from the pan and serve.

text: Take the flour, salt, and baking powder and milk into the mixing bowl. Start stirring, until there are no lumps or flour in the mixture. Crack the eggs and add to the bowl, the pancake mix is ready to fry.  Heat the oil in the pan at moderate temperature. A tablespoon full of oil per pancake will be enough. Take the amount of 2 to 3 tablespoons per pancake. Distribute it by moving the pan to get the pan surface completely covered with the mass. Continue frying the pancake until ready.  Flip the pancake over and fry the other side.  Remove from the pan and serve.
